examples.example: 我通过自己的努力工作，终于攒够了一万元，这让我特别有成就感。

translate.english: I finally saved up to ten thousand yuan through my own hard work, which made me feel particularly accomplished.

examples.example: 我用积攒的一万元给父母买了一份贴心的礼物，他们特别开心。

translate.english: I used the saved 10,000 yuan to buy a considerate gift for my parents, and they were extremely happy.

examples.example: 我用自己兼职赚来的一万元给山区的孩子们买了很多学习用品，看到他们开心的笑容，我也觉得很幸福。

translate.english: I used the ten thousand yuan I earned from my part-time job to buy a lot of school supplies for the children in the mountainous areas. Seeing their happy smiles, I also felt very happy.
